title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Flying by the seat of your pants delivers mixed results today. Thankfully, you can roll with the punches at work as your tasks change throughout the day. Perhaps you possess a near-perfect formula for balancing speed with restraint to maximize your efficiency. But your communication with coworkers could be too lax or even cryptic now. Someone might even feel youre addressing them as casually as a sibling or close friend. Of course, you want to stay in your own mental flow, but you need to speak clearly to others as if they cant read your mind. A lack of boundaries invites a lack of respect. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
